School.Name: Stanford University
School.Description: ML Systems researcher inspired by data management applications. I am part of the Hazy Research lab and affiliated with the Stanford AI Lab, StatML Group, and CRFM.

School.Name: University of Pennsylvania, Jerome Fisher Program in Management & Technology
School.Degree: BSE CS (Engineering School), BS Economics with Finance Concentration (Wharton School)
School.Description: At Penn, I was involved in: Penn Varsity Womens' Squash Team, CS Research, CS Teaching Assistant, Penn Women in Physics Club President. In research, I worked with Boon Thau Loo, Vincent Liu, and Vijay Kumar.
